description: Try our easy to follow Baked Asian Greens With Soy & Coconut Sprinkle recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Baked Asian Greens With Soy & Coconut Sprinkle Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 fresh long red chilli, thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220Â°C. Line a large baking tray with baking paper.
Place pak choy and broccolini on tray. Drizzle with 1 tbs oil and bake for 10 minutes or until tender, adding edamame to tray for the last 3 minutes of cooking. Season.

Meanwhile, heat remaining oil in a small frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook garlic and chilli, stirring, for 1 minute or until fragrant. Add soy sauce and bring to the boil. Remove from heat. Serve greens drizzled with soy sauce mixture and topped with coconut and sesame seeds.
